gw.api.domain.invoice

Class InvoiceAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.InvoiceAssembler

  • public class InvoiceAssembler
extends java.lang.Object
    An InvoiceAssembler assembles invoices from invoice items by placing invoice items onto the invoices that are appropriate for those items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • place

        public static InvoiceAssembler place(java.util.List<InvoiceItem> invoiceItems)
        Creates an InvoiceAssembler that can place the given invoice items onto the right Invoices. For example, 
         InvoiceAssembler.place(invoiceItems).ontoInvoiceStreamsOf(charge)
        Parameters:
        invoiceItems - list of invoice items to place
        Returns:
        an assembler to be used to place the items

      • place

        public static InvoiceAssembler place(InvoiceItem... invoiceItems)
        Same as place(List) but accepts an array or varargs instead of a List.
        Parameters:
        invoiceItems - list of invoice items to place
        Returns:
        an assembler to be used to place the items

      • reversingPayments

        public InvoiceAssembler reversingPayments(ReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem shouldReversePayments)
        When invoice items are added to an invoice, this option can indicate whether the payment(s) against the invoice item(s) should be reversed. The default is ReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem.No
        Parameters:
        shouldReversePayments - one of ReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem values.
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set.

      • cleanupEmptyInvoices

        public InvoiceAssembler cleanupEmptyInvoices(boolean cleanup)
        When invoice items are added to an invoice, this option indicates whether the original or target invoices should be retired if they are empty after placement.
        Parameters:
        cleanup - Whether to remove empty invoices after placing invoice items.
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set.

      • forProducerCode

        public InvoiceAssembler forProducerCode(ProducerCode producerCode)
        When invoice items are added to an invoice, what producer in AB should earn commission
        Parameters:
        producerCode - producer code to assign to when the payer is a producer
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set.

      • allowOnBilledOrDueInvoices

        public InvoiceAssembler allowOnBilledOrDueInvoices(boolean allowOnBilledOrDueInvoices)
        Sets whether or not invoice items can be placed on billed and due invoices. The default is false -- invoice items will be placed only on invoices that the assembler creates and existing planned invoices.
        Parameters:
        allowOnBilledOrDueInvoices - whether or not invoice items can be placed on billed and due invoices
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set

      • allowOnBilledOrDueInvoices

        public InvoiceAssembler allowOnBilledOrDueInvoices()
        Allows the assembler to place items on existing invoices that are billed or due.
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set

      • allowOnAdHocInvoices

        public InvoiceAssembler allowOnAdHocInvoices(boolean allowOnAdHocInvoices)
        Sets whether or not invoice items can be placed on ad-hoc invoices. The default is false.
        Parameters:
        allowOnAdHocInvoices - true to allow/disallow placement on ad hoc invoices
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set

      • allowOnAdHocInvoices

        public InvoiceAssembler allowOnAdHocInvoices()
        Allows the assembler to place items on ad-hoc invoices.
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set

      • useCatchUpInvoiceForPastItems

        public InvoiceAssembler useCatchUpInvoiceForPastItems(boolean useCatchUpInvoiceForPastItems)
        Sets whether or not to place past items on a catch-up invoice billed today. The default is false.

        If this is true, the assembler will place billed and due invoice items on an invoice that will bill today. This invoice may be a new invoice created for this purpose, or, if there's already an invoice that will be billed today, that invoice will be used.

        Parameters:
        useCatchUpInvoiceForPastItems - whether or not to place all billed and due items on an invoice that will bill today
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set

      • useCatchUpInvoiceForPastItems

        public InvoiceAssembler useCatchUpInvoiceForPastItems()
        Configures the assembler to place past items on a catch-up invoice billed today.
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate option set

      • withContext

        public InvoiceAssembler withContext(InvoiceAssemblerContext context)
        Parameters:
        context - the context the invoice assembler is called from
        Returns:
        this assembler with the appropriate context set

      • ontoInvoice

        public void ontoInvoice(Invoice invoiceForAllItems)
        Places the given invoice items from the place() method onto the given invoice.
        Parameters:
        invoiceForAllItems - all of the invoice items will be placed onto this invoice

      • ontoInvoiceStreamOf

        public void ontoInvoiceStreamOf(Charge charge)
        Places the given invoice items from the place() method onto the default invoice stream of the given charge.
        Parameters:
        charge - all of the invoice items will be placed on the default invoice stream of this charge

      • ontoInvoiceStreamsOf

        public void ontoInvoiceStreamsOf(InvoicePayer payer)
        Places the given invoice items from the place() method onto appropriate invoice streams of the given payer. The appropriate streams are selected based on the payment plan of the charge of each invoice item. Since the invoice items may have different charges with different payment plans, the items may be placed on different invoice streams.
        Parameters:
        payer - all of the invoice items will be placed on invoice streams of this payer

      • ontoInvoiceStream

        public void ontoInvoiceStream(InvoiceStream invoiceStream)
        Places the given invoice items from the place() method onto the given invoice stream.
        Parameters:
        invoiceStream - all of the invoice items will be placed on this invoice stream
